name: phpipam
description: A Pulumi package for creating and managing phpipam cloud resources.
attribution: This Pulumi package is based on the [`phpipam` Terraform Provider](https://github.com/terraform-providers/terraform-provider-phpipam).

appId.description: The application ID required for API requests

endpoint.description: The full URL (plus path) to the API endpoint

insecure.description: Whether server should be accessed without verifying the TLS certificate.

password.description: The password of the PHPIPAM account

username.description: The username of the PHPIPAM account

provider.description:
The provider type for the phpipam package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration
settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource
construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the
[documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.

appId.description: The application ID required for API requests

endpoint.description: The full URL (plus path) to the API endpoint

insecure.description: Whether server should be accessed without verifying the TLS certificate.

password.description: The password of the PHPIPAM account

username.description: The username of the PHPIPAM account
